title: Marek Fundakowski
text: Marek Fundakowski (born 18 April 1988 in <a href="Jas%C5%82o">Jasło</a>, <a href="Poland">Poland</a>) is a Polish <a href="association%20football">football</a>er who currently plays for <a href="Karpaty%20Krosno">Karpaty Krosno</a>. He also played in <a href="Kro%C5%9Bnianka%20Krosno">Krośnianka Krosno</a>, <a href="Stal%20Mielec">Stal Mielec</a> and <a href="SC%20Young%20Fellows%20Juventus">SC Young Fellows Juventus</a>.
